meanings.definition: A product of steam distillation containing the water-soluble constituents of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The hydrosol from the rose petals smelled lovely.
meanings.sent2: She sprayed the hydrosol on her face as a natural toner.
meanings.sent3: The hydrosol danced in the air, leaving a refreshing mist.
meanings.sent4: The hydrosol was a gentle kiss of nature on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The hydrosol captured the essence of the garden in a bottle.

meanings.definition: A fragrant water obtained by steam distillation of flowers or herbs.
meanings.sent1: The hydrosol of lavender was used in aromatherapy.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the soothing scent of the hydrosol after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the bottle of hydrosol, creating a fragrant mess.
meanings.sent4: The hydrosol was a whisper of floral freshness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The hydrosol carried the essence of the meadow into the house.
